text: He holds that more pressure can be put on South Africa while she remains in the Commonwealth than could be exercised were she cut off from it. On the other hand, those who favour expulsion, including African leaders, feel that nothing less than the shock of expulsion will weaken the grip of Dr. Verwoerd and the Nationalists. They point out that Dr. Verwoerd refuses to consider abandoning the apartheid policy.
handwritten_text: He holds that more pressure can be put on South Africa while she remains in the Commonwealth than could be exercised were she cut off from it. On the other hand, those who favour expulsion, including African leaders, feel that nothing less than the shock of expulsion will weaken the grip of Dr. Verwoerd and the Nationalists. They point out that Dr. Verwoerd refuses to consider abandoning the apartheid policy.
